{
    "menus": [
      {
        "id": "newTerrainMenu",
        "x": 200,
        "y": 150,
        "width": 150,
        "height": 100,
        "title": "New terrain",
        "show": true,
        "buttons": [
            {
                "id": "newTerrainButtonOk",
                "x": 20,
                "y": 20,
                "width": 50,
                "height": 10,
                "text": "Ok"
                "action": "createTerrainAction"
            },
            {
                "id": "newTerrainButtonCancel",
                "x": 60,
                "y": 20,
                "width": 50,
                "height": 10,
                "text": "Cancel"
                "action": "createTerrainCancelAction"
            }
        ],
        "checkboxes": [
            {
                "group": "checkboxesNewTerrain",
                "checked": true,
                ...
            },
            ...
        ]
      }
    ]
}

Lexical analyzer
----------------
alpha = A-Z|a-z
digit = 0-9
space = \s
string = \"[alpha|digit|space]*\"
number = [1-9][digit]+
boolean = true|false
open_curly = {
close_curly = }
open_square = [
close_square = ]
colon = :
comma = ,

Parser
------

object = {}
object = { members } 
members = pair
members = pair , members
pair = string : value
array = []
array = [ elements ]
elements = value
elements = value , elements
value = string
value = number
value = object
value = array
value = true
value = false

1 object = {}
2 object = { members } 
3 members = pair
4 members = pair , members
5 pair = string : value
6 array = []
7 array = [ elements ]
8 elements = value
9 elements = value , elements
10 value = string
11 value = number
12 value = object
13 value = array
14 value = true
15 value = false
